immune.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it
immune.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
immune.translation[0].definitions[1].def: not affected by something that happens or is done
immune.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The Labour Party is not immune to new ideas.
immune.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The senior members of the group appeared to be immune from arrest.
